page.title: 12The School
page.content: The School was founded in 1867 as a church School for the education of the children of Daglingworth. In recent years children have come to it from other villages, some from as much as four miles away brought in by School bus. Although the School is now controlled by the Education Committee, we have kept our connections with the Church and children have a service or concert in the Church at least once a year. During the past 2 years the numbers of children have dropped below 20 and the Education Committee have proposed that it should be closed in July l986. The School, which had the head teacher's house attached, has a playground in front and a small garden at the back.
